function getScroll(w){var ret=w.pageXOffset;var method='scrollLeft';if(typeof ret!=='number'){var d=w.document;// ie6,7,8 standard mode
ret=d.documentElement[method];if(typeof ret!=='number'){// quirks mode
ret=d.body[method];}}return ret;}function getClientPosition(elem){var x;var y;var doc=elem.ownerDocument;var body=doc.body;var docElem=doc&&doc.documentElement;var box=elem.getBoundingClientRect();x=box.left;y=box.top;x-=docElem.clientLeft||body.clientLeft||0;y-=docElem.clientTop||body.clientTop||0;return{left:x,top:y};}export function getOffsetLeft(el){var pos=getClientPosition(el);var doc=el.ownerDocument;// Only IE use `parentWindow`
var w=doc.defaultView||doc.parentWindow;pos.left+=getScroll(w);return pos.left;}
